patterns: I didn't receive a confirmation email.
responses: Please check your spam folder or request a new verification email.

patterns: Can I log in with my phone number?
What are the supported login methods?
responses: Currently, we support login via email and third-party providers like Google and Apple.

patterns: How do I book a hall?
responses: Go to the dashboard, select ‘Halls’, search by location, budget, and capacity, then choose and confirm a booking.

patterns: How to cancel a hall booking?
responses: Yes, you can cancel your booking within the vendor’s cancellation policy period.

patterns: How do I contact a vendor?
responses: Click on ‘View Details’ of a vendor and use the ‘Message Vendor’ option.

patterns: What payment methods do you accept?
responses: We support credit/debit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers.
Refunds depend on the vendor’s cancellation policy. Please check the vendor’s terms before booking.

patterns: How do I register as a vendor?
How can I become a vendor?
responses: Click on ‘Become a Vendor’ in the settings menu and fill in your business details.

patterns: What services can I offer as a vendor?
What types of vendors are allowed?
responses: Vendors can list Halls, Catering, Photography, and Decor services.

patterns: How long does vendor approval take?
How much time for vendor verification?
responses: Approval usually takes 24-48 hours after submission.

patterns: How do I manage my bookings?
How can vendors track their bookings?
responses: Go to ‘Track Bookings’ in your vendor dashboard to accept or reject requests.

patterns: Can I update my pricing and availability?
How do vendors update their profiles?
responses: Yes, you can update pricing, images, and availability from your vendor profile.

patterns: How do I create a to-do list?
How to manage my event tasks?
responses: Navigate to ‘To-Do List’ from the menu and add tasks like venue booking and invitations.

patterns: How to set notifications for tasks?
responses: Yes, you can add due dates and notifications for each task.
You can reach us via the ‘Help & Support’ section in the app.

patterns: What is the customer support email?
responses: You can email us at support@eventplanner.com.
Our support team is available from 9 AM to 6 PM.

patterns: Is there a live chat option?
responses: Yes, you can chat with support in real-time for urgent issues.
